summary: MAZDA HEADRESTS TILT TOO FAR FORWARD.  WE WERE READY TO BUY A MAZDA5 BUT WHEN MY WIFE GOT BEHIND THE WHEEL IN THE TEST DRIVE THE HEADREST PUSHED HER HEAD FORWARD; CANNOT ADJUST TILT. SHE GOT A HEADACHE AFTER THE TEST DRIVE.  THIS IS NOT SAFE. SHOULD SUPPORT FROM BOTTOM OF HEAD AND AROUND BACK OF HEAD -- INSTEAD IT PUSHED FORWARD FROM TOP OF HEAD!  WORST HEADREST I HAVE EVER SEEN -- NO REAL SUPPORT FOR HEAD. CUSTOMERS WILL (AND DO) TURN THESE AROUND, PROVIDING NO SUPPORT AND LITTLE PROTECTION.  *TR
